bug.author: utopianpallu
bug.summary: Autogluon Object detection task not getting trained on cpu.
bug.description:
Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Innixma>@Innixma</denchmark-link> , I used cpu for training but it is giving error,
But whenever i am using gpu it gives me correct results.

comments.comment: Actually, I believe a PR already exists to fix this, and should be merged sometime soon: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/awslabs/autogluon/pull/697>#697</denchmark-link>
